title: Patch Notes
content:
e action for washing yourself with soap and sponges is now called 'Use' instead of 'Consume'. Fixed your player character's name getting reverted to 'Custom' during Character Creation if you moved on to create your Dream Guardian and then went back to edit the player character again. Fixed the wrong spell Ability showing up when selecting a Feat during Level Up.

Added a new loading screen in Act III, showing the busy streets of Baldur's Gate. Fixed the skirt part of the Adamantine Splint Armour
